name: piccadillywall
author: robertocarroll <robertocarroll@gmail.com>
description: A Twitter bot for finding food in Manchester City Centre

scripts.start: PORT=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_PORT BIND_ADDRESS=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_IP HEROKU_URL=$OPENSHIFT_APP_DNS REDIS_URL=redis://:$REDIS_PASSWORD@$OPENSHIFT_REDIS_HOST:$OPENSHIFT_REDIS_PORT bin/hubot bin/hubot -a twitter -n piccadillywall
